DataElement.preferredName: Pulmonary Dysfunction Due To Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Present Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether pulmonary dysfunction due to chronic graft versus host disease was present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pulmonary Dysfunction Due To Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Impaired or abnormal functioning of the pulmonary system.:Caused by or resulting from._A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Impaired or abnormal functioning of the pulmonary system.

Concepts.definition: Impaired or abnormal functioning of the pulmonary system.

Property.preferredName: Due To Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Present
Property.preferredDefinition: Caused by or resulting from._A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
